name: Entertainer
description: You spent much of your youth following traveling performers or circuses, learning to perform and entertain. You have practiced your art until you became a skilled performer in your own right.

feature.name: By Popular Demand
feature.description: You can always find a place to perform, from a village tavern to a noble court. You receive free lodging and food in exchange for performances. Your performance creates a local sensation, and strangers recognize you if you've performed there before.
